function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Data loss or corruption during download","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of suitable ventilation risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disposal protocols for medical waste","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of futureproofing in asset management risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate medical gas supply network","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contagion due to inadequate video and audio ugs limiting benefits and exacerbating pandemic impact.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of increased infection in houses with several occupants","category":"Public the population are senior citizens who live alone, and only 1.3% of the inhabitants share their homes with three or more occupants.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Visiting parks on weekends and weekdays without a preference may lead to crowded spaces, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Majority of respondents visited parks alone during the confinement, contradicting the recommended social gathering guidelines.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Visitors’ tendency to wander through the space rather than staying in one place during the confinement may result in increased interactions and overlapping of individuals, elevating disease transmission risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting surveys with 298 participants during a pandemic may increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health
